extends java.lang.Object

      • isInfinite

        public boolean isInfinite(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lores)
        Determines if the stick is infinte
        Parameters:
        lores - Given these lores from the stick
        Returns:
        True if infinite stick

      • getUsesFromLore

        public int getUsesFromLore(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lores)
        This method was created incase someone wants to put "%remaining uses out of 50% Where the last int is NOT the remaining uses. There's probably a more efficient way to do this but I haven't gotten around to recoding it and it hasn't given an issue yet.
        Parameters:
        lores - Takes a string list
        Returns:
        finds the uses in the lores and returns as int.

      • parseDurabilityLine

        public java.lang.String parseDurabilityLine(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lores)
        Loops through the lores and determines if lines are valid and if they're color codes. Also parses the durability from all it. Tried to make this as idiot-proof as possible, but made code sloppy
        Parameters:
        lores - Lores of the sellstick
        Returns:
        a specially "encrypted" string that can be read to make sense by further methods.

      • postSale

        public void postSale(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lores,
                     int uses,
                     org.bukkit.entity.Player p,

        Handles the sellstick after the 'sale' has been made.
        Parameters:
        lores - Lores of the sellstick
        uses - number of uses
        p - The player who used it
        total - how much was sold
        im - Item meta of the stick
        is - Item stack object of the stick

      • onUse

        public void onUse(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent e)
        Handles the actual clicking event of the player. Deprecated since getItemHand in 1.9+ should specify which hand, but will keep since it allows for backwards compatibility EventPriority Should let all other plugins handle whether or not sellstick can be used.
        Parameters:
        e - The event
